system.description:
You are not part of the fellowship. You are chasing them.

Every session, you are either hot on their trail, or lying in wait ahead of them. When there is a lull in the action, you may jump in to mess things up. Tell us where you're coming from, and take the Spotlight.

If you Finish Them or the fellowship Finishes You with Blood, on a 10+, the player who was Finished damages all their stats and becomes Taken Out. This happens instead of being killed. When rolling with other stats, apply the usual 10+ Finish Them results.

When you get Taken Out, you are out of play for the rest of the session, but you will Recover between session.

You do not Recover when the rest of the fellowship does.

When you join the fellowship, temporarily or otherwise, replace this playbook with The Redeemed. Keep all the same options you picked, including your level and Moves and stats, but use the text found on that playbook instead.
